creator: BluSmart Mobility Tech Private Ltd.
descriptionHtml:
Use Blu Smart to enjoy 100% Electric, Safe & Reliable rides for your Gurugram and Airport/Aerocity travel at FLAT fares starting ₹99!

Blu Smart is the first of its kind All-electric cab platform that provides noiseless emission-free electric sedans and unlocks the era of smart urban electric mobility for consumers.

At this crucial time, we understand the importance of Responsible Mobility and we have revamped our services to ensure that we are not just the safest mobility option in India but also a benchmark for safe mobility in Asia

You can count on Blu Smart Cabs for all your important trips within Gurugram or IGI Airport/ Aerocity. Blu Smart is the only cab service where you will never face Surge pricing, High ETAs, driver cancellations, unclean and uncomfortable cabs.

Why Ride in a Blu Smart Cab?

SAFE & SANITIZED CABS: All Blu-Smart cabs will be sanitized before & after every ride. The time of each car's last sanitization will be available to riders for their safety and comfort.

MANDATORY MASKS: Blu Smart requires all drivers and riders to wear a mask while travelling.
Don't have one? Book one before or during your ride.

SANITIZER IN EACH CAB: Good hygiene is in our hands, and we know it. That’s why we have installed a hand sanitizer for our riders in all our cabs.

SAFETY SHEETS IN EVERY CAB: Driver safety-cockpits have been installed in all Blu-Smart cabs to maintain the adequate social-distancing between the driver and the rider.


ZERO TAILPIPE EMISSIONS: All our cars are Electric, have zero-tailpipe emission, unlike other CNG/Diesel cabs. At Blu-Smart, our aim is to build a better future for our cities.

NO SURGE PRICING: No Variability in Fares! We operate on a fixed tier pricing model starting from flat ₹99/- only for intra-Gurugram rides, flat ₹349 for rides to Airport/Aerocity and flat ₹399 for pickups from Terminal 3. No need to worry about surge or unpleasant pricing surprises.

RELIABLE AND ON-TIME SERVICE GUARANTEE: We reach the pickup location every time, on time. Once you book a cab, it is our responsibility to make sure that the cab arrives at your location 5 minutes before your scheduled pickup time.

PREMIUM, NOISELESS CABS: All our cabs are owned by us and we ensure that you get a clean, well-maintained, noiseless vehicle each time. All our cabs are vibration-free, premium sedans with large boot space.

SAFETY: Our Trusted and Responsible driver-partners are Police Verified, and are engaged with us full-time. With background checked, trained drivers to escort you to your destination, safety should be the last thing you should be worried about.

MINIMUM SURFACE CONTACT: To help riders avoid surface contact as best possible, Blu-Smart driver-partners will open the door for our riders.

Steps to book a ride from Gurugram:

1. Select your Destination
2. Select the time at which you want the cab. You can book 45 minutes to 48 hours in advance..
3. Select your Payment Method.
4. Confirm your Ride. No need to worry about Driver Cancellation. Driver will arrive for pickup 5 minutes before scheduled time.
5. Enjoy a relaxing ride in a safe, sanitized, eco-friendly, noiseless cab.
6. Get down at the destination refreshed. Pay after completing the ride.

Steps to book a ride from IGI Terminal 3 to Gurugram:

1. Head to the BluSmart Pickup zone at Level 2, Multi-level car parking (above Uber and Ola Pickup zone).
2. Generate a PIN from the BluSmart app or our kiosk.
3. Get into the first available cab and share the PIN with the driver.
4. Enjoy a relaxing ride in a safe, sanitized, eco-friendly, noiseless cab.
5. Get down at the destination. Pay after completing the ride.

Ride Blu-Smart ALL-ELECTRIC cabs and take India to a better, greener future.

Like us on FB: https://www.facebook.com/blusmartindia/
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/BluSmartIndia


Have any questions? Please write to us on support@blu-smart.com

SAFE & SANITIZED: All Blu Smart cabs are sanitized before every ride. Car sanitization time is available in-app to riders for their peace of mind.
MANDATORY MASKS: Blu Smart requires all drivers and riders to wear a mask on trip. Don’t have one? Book one before or during your ride.
IN-CAB SANITIZER: Good hygiene is in our hands. That’s why we’ve put a hand sanitizer for riders in all our cabs.
SAFETY SEPARATORS: Driver safety-cockpits have been installed in all Blu Smart cabs to maintain adequate social distancing between the driver and the rider.
MINIMUM SURFACE CONTACT: To minimize surface contact, Blu Smart driver partners will open the door for our riders.

RELIABLE ON-TIME SERVICE GUARANTEE: We are on time, every time. We make sure the cab arrives at your pickup location 5 minutes before your scheduled pickup time.
PREMIUM, NOISELESS CABS: All our cabs are owned by us and we ensure that you get a clean, well-maintained, noiseless vehicle each time. All vehicles are vibration-free, premium sedans with large boot space.
RIDES & HOURLY RENTALS: Whether you need to ride to work and reach ON TIME, or be out & about to pick up groceries and run a few errands without having to switch between multiple cabs for the sake of hygiene and safety, we’ve got a Blu Smart for every use!
TRUSTED DRIVERS: Our trusted and responsible driver-partners are Police Verified, and are engaged with us full-time. With background checks, trained drivers escort you to your destination safely.
SEVERAL WAYS TO PAY: You’ve got over 10 ways to pay, including credit and debit cards, UPI, Net banking, PayTM, MobiKwik, PayZapp, Freecharge and more. Just add money to your BLU WALLET and that's it. Pay for your rides, your way!

Steps to book a ride or hourly rental from Gurugram:
1. Select your pickup and drop-off locations.
2. Select your pickup time and package (in case of hourly rentals). You can book 45 minutes to 48 hours in advance.
3. Select your payment method.
4. Confirm your ride. No need to worry about driver cancellation. Driver will arrive for pickup 5 minutes before scheduled time.
6. Enjoy your ride and get down at the destination refreshed. Pay through cash/wallet after completing your ride.

Steps to book a ride from IGI Terminal 3 to Gurugram:
1. Head to Blu Smart Pickup Zone at Level 2, Multi-Level Car Parking (above Uber and Ola Pickup zones).
2. Generate a PIN instantly from the kiosk or Blu Smart app. Or use the one generated during ride scheduling.
3. Get into the first available cab and share the PIN with the driver.
5. Enjoy your ride and get down at the destination. Pay through cash/wallet after completing your ride.

creator: BluSmart Mobility Tech Private Ltd.
descriptionHtml:
Looking for a safe, reliable and pollution-free ride in Gurugram or to the Airport/Aerocity?
Introducing BluSmart – the first of its kind, all-electric cab service that provides noiseless and emission-free electric sedans, and unlocks the era of smart urban electric mobility!
BluSmart is the only cab service where you will never face Surge pricing, High ETAs, driver cancellations, or unclean and uncomfortable cabs.
In the current scenario, we understand the meaning of Responsible Mobility and, therefore, have revamped our services to ensure that we are not only the safest mobility option in India but also a benchmark for safe mobility in Asia.
So, how are we bringing this change? Here’s what you would want to know:

SAFE & SANITIZED CABS: As per our Standard Operating Procedure, all cabs are sanitized before & after every ride. The time of each car's last sanitization is available to riders for their safety and satisfaction.

MANDATORY MASKS: BluSmart requires all drivers and riders to wear a mask while travelling. Don't have one? Book one before or during your ride.

SANITIZER IN EACH CAB: Good hygiene is in our hands, and we know it. That’s why we have installed a hand sanitizer for our riders in all our cabs.

SAFETY SHEETS IN EVERY CAB: Driver safety-cockpits have been installed in all Blu-Smart cabs to maintain the adequate social-distancing between the driver and the rider.

ZERO TAILPIPE EMISSIONS: Our mission is to have Zero Emission. Our sole purpose is to save the environment. All our cars are Electric, and have zero-tailpipe emission, unlike other CNG/Diesel cabs. We aim to build a better future for our cities.

NO SURGE PRICING: No Variability in Fares! We operate on a fixed tier pricing model starting from flat ₹99/- for short intra-Gurugram rides, flat ₹349 for rides to Airport/Aerocity and flat ₹399 for pickups from Terminal 3. Never worry about surge or unpleasant pricing surprises!

RELIABLE AND ON-TIME SERVICE, GUARANTEED: We promise to pick you up on time, every time. Once you book a cab, it is our responsibility to make sure that the cab arrives at your location 5 minutes before your scheduled pickup time.

PREMIUM, NOISELESS CABS: All our cabs are owned by us and we ensure that you get a clean, well-maintained, and a noiseless vehicle each time. All our cabs are vibration-free, premium sedans with a large boot space.

SAFETY: Our Trusted and Responsible driver-partners are Police Verified, and carefully handpicked by our team. With background checked, trained drivers to escort you to your destination, safety should be the last thing you should be worried about.

ZERO CONTACT RIDES: To help you avoid touching common surfaces like the door-handles, BluSmart drivers will open the door for you during pick-up and drop-off!

EASY & CONVENIENT PAYMENTS: We accept all payment popular methods including credit and debit cards (AmEx, Visa, Mastercard, etc), UPI, Netbanking (all banks), PayTM, MobiKwik, PayZapp, Freecharge and more.

AVAILABILITY: We’re available 24x7 with our responsible drivers and 100% Electric Cabs, in Delhi & Gurugram. Coming soon to all major Indian cities!

Steps to book a ride from Gurugram:
1. Select your Destination
2. Select the time at which you want the cab. You can book 45 minutes to 48 hours in advance.
3. Choose a Payment Method.
4. Confirm your Ride. No need to worry about Driver Cancellation. A BluSmart will pick you up 5 minutes before your scheduled time.
5. Enjoy a relaxing ride in a safe, sanitized, eco-friendly cab.
6. Get down at the destination refreshed. Pay after completing the ride.

So, the next time you need to step out, all you’ve got to do is BOOK A RIDE WITH BluSmart – India’s finest & safest cab app!

Like us on FB: https://www.facebook.com/blusmartindia/
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/BluSmartIndia
Follow up on Instagram: https://instagram.com/blusmartindia

Have any questions? Please write to us at support@blu-smart.com

descriptionHtml:
Use BluSmart to enjoy 100% Electric, Safe, & Reliable rides and rentals for all your travel needs in Gurugram, IGI Airport, and Delhi upto Dwarka, Vasant Kunj, and Vasant Vihar at FLAT fares starting at just ₹99! BluSmart is the first of its kind, all-electric cab platform, that provides noiseless emission-free electric sedans and unlocks an era of smart urban electric mobility.


At this crucial time, we understand the importance of Responsible Mobility and have revamped our services to set new safety standards across India and Asia. BluSmart is the only cab service where you will never face surge pricing, high ETAs, driver cancellations, unclean and uncomfortable cabs.


Why ride in a BluSmart Cab?


SAFE & SANITIZED: All BluSmart cabs are sanitized before every ride. Car sanitization time is updated on a regular basis and is mentioned on the app.

MANDATORY MASKS: BluSmart requires all drivers and riders to wear a mask on trips. Don't have one? Book one before or during your ride.
IN-CAB SANITIZER: Good hygiene is in our hands. That's why we've installed a hand sanitizer for our riders in all our cabs.


SAFETY SEPARATORS: Driver safety-cockpits have been installed in all BluSmart cabs to maintain adequate social distancing between the driver and the rider.


MINIMUM SURFACE CONTACT: To minimize surface contact, our driver-partners always open the door for our riders.


ZERO TAILPIPE EMISSIONS: All our cars are electric and have zero-tailpipe emission, unlike other CNG/diesel cabs. At BluSmart, our aim is to build a greener future.


NO SURGE PRICING: No variability in fares! We operate on a fixed tiered pricing model starting at flat ₹99.


RELIABLE, ON-TIME SERVICE GUARANTEE: We are on time, every time. We make sure that your cab reaches your pickup location 5 minutes before your scheduled pickup time.


PREMIUM, NOISELESS CABS: We ensure that you get a clean, well-maintained, noiseless vehicle each time. All vehicles are vibration-free, premium sedans with large boot space.


RIDES & HOURLY RENTALS: Whether you need to ride to work and reach ON TIME, or be out & about to pick up groceries and run a few errands without having to switch between multiple cabs for the sake of hygiene and safety, we've got a BluSmart for every use!


TRUSTED DRIVERS: Our trusted and responsible driver-partners are Police Verified, and are engaged with us full-time. With thorough background checks, our trained drivers escort you to your destination safely.


MULTIPLE PAYMENT OPTIONS: You've got over 10 ways to pay, including credit and debit cards, UPI, Net banking, PayTM, MobiKwik, PayZapp, Freecharge and more. Just add money to your BLU WALLET and that's it. Pay for your rides, your way!


Steps to book a ride or an hourly rental:
1. Select your pickup and drop location respectively.
2. Select your pickup time and package (in case of hourly rentals). You can book 45 minutes to 48 hours in advance.
3. Select your payment method.
4. Confirm your ride. No need to worry about driver cancellation. Driver will arrive at your pickup location 5 minutes before the scheduled time.
6. Enjoy your ride and get down at the destination, refreshed. Pay through cash/wallet after completing your ride.

Steps to book a ride from IGI Terminal 3:
1. Head to BluSmart Pickup Zone at Level 2, Multi-Level Car Parking (above Uber and Ola Pickup zones).
2. Generate a PIN instantly from the kiosk or BluSmart app. Or use the one generated during ride scheduling.
3. Get into the first available cab and share the PIN with the driver.
5. Enjoy your ride and get down at the destination. Pay through cash/wallet after completing your ride.


Ride BluSmart ALL-ELECTRIC cabs and take India to a better, greener future.
Like us on FB: https://www.facebook.com/blusmartindia/
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/BluSmartIndia
Have any questions? Please write to us on support@blu-smart.com

IN-CAB SANITIZER: Good hygiene is in our hands. That's why we've installed a hand sanitizer for our riders in all our cabs.


SAFETY SEPARATORS: Driver safety-cockpits have been installed in all BluSmart cabs to maintain adequate social distancing between the driver and the rider.


MINIMUM SURFACE CONTACT: To minimize surface contact, our driver-partners always open the door for our riders.


ZERO TAILPIPE EMISSIONS: All our cars are electric and have zero-tailpipe emission, unlike other CNG/diesel cabs. At BluSmart, our aim is to build a greener future.


NO SURGE PRICING: No variability in fares! We operate on a fixed tiered pricing model starting at flat ₹99.


RELIABLE, ON-TIME SERVICE GUARANTEE: We are on time, every time. We make sure that your cab reaches your pickup location 5 minutes before your scheduled pickup time.


PREMIUM, NOISELESS CABS: We ensure that you get a clean, well-maintained, noiseless vehicle each time. All vehicles are vibration-free, premium sedans with large boot space.


RIDES & HOURLY RENTALS: Whether you need to ride to work and reach ON TIME, or be out & about to pick up groceries and run a few errands without having to switch between multiple cabs for the sake of hygiene and safety, we've got a BluSmart for every use!


TRUSTED DRIVERS: Our trusted and responsible driver-partners are Police Verified, and are engaged with us full-time. With thorough background checks, our trained drivers escort you to your destination safely.

Steps to book a ride or an hourly rental:
1. Select your pickup and drop location respectively.

3. Get into the first available cab and share the PIN with the driver.

PREMIUM, NOISELESS CABS: We ensure that you get a clean, well-maintained, noiseless vehicle each time. All vehicles are vibration-free, premium sedans with large boot space.

MULTIPLE PAYMENT OPTIONS: You've got over 10 ways to pay, including credit and debit cards, UPI, Net banking, PayTM, MobiKwik, PayZapp, Freecharge and more. Just add money to your BLU WALLET and that's it. Pay for your rides, your way!


Steps to book a ride or an hourly rental:
1. Select your pickup and drop location respectively.
2. Select your pickup time and package (in case of hourly rentals). You can book 45 minutes to 48 hours in advance.
3. Select your payment method.
4. Confirm your ride. No need to worry about driver cancellation. Driver will arrive at your pickup location 5 minutes before the scheduled time.
5. Enjoy your ride and get down at the destination, refreshed. Pay through cash/wallet after completing your ride.

Steps to book a ride from IGI Terminal 3:
1. Head to BluSmart Pickup Zone at Level 1, Multi-Level Car Parking (above Uber and Ola Pickup zones).
2. Generate a PIN instantly from the kiosk or BluSmart app. Or use the one generated during ride scheduling.
3. Get into the first available cab and share the PIN with the driver.
4. Enjoy your ride and get down at the destination. Pay through cash/wallet after completing your ride.

At this crucial time, we understand the importance of Responsible Mobility and have revamped our services to set new safety standards across India and Asia. BluSmart is the only cab service where you will never face surge pricing, high ETAs, driver cancellations, unclean and uncomfortable cabs.


Why ride in a BluSmart Cab?


SAFE & SANITIZED: All BluSmart cabs are sanitized before every ride. Car sanitization time is updated on a regular basis and is mentioned on the app.

MANDATORY MASKS: BluSmart requires all drivers and riders to wear a mask on trips. Don't have one? Book one before or during your ride.
IN-CAB SANITIZER: Good hygiene is in our hands. That's why we've installed a hand sanitizer for our riders in all our cabs.


SAFETY SEPARATORS: Driver safety-cockpits have been installed in all BluSmart cabs to maintain adequate social distancing between the driver and the rider.


MINIMUM SURFACE CONTACT: To minimize surface contact, our driver-partners always open the door for our riders.


ZERO TAILPIPE EMISSIONS: All our cars are electric and have zero-tailpipe emission, unlike other CNG/diesel cabs. At BluSmart, our aim is to build a greener future.


NO SURGE PRICING: No variability in fares! We operate on a fixed tiered pricing model starting at flat ₹99.


RELIABLE, ON-TIME SERVICE GUARANTEE: We are on time, every time. We make sure that your cab reaches your pickup location 5 minutes before your scheduled pickup time.


PREMIUM, NOISELESS CABS: We ensure that you get a clean, well-maintained, noiseless vehicle each time. All vehicles are vibration-free, premium sedans with large boot space.


RIDES & HOURLY RENTALS: Whether you need to ride to work and reach ON TIME, or be out & about to pick up groceries and run a few errands without having to switch between multiple cabs for the sake of hygiene and safety, we've got a BluSmart for every use!


TRUSTED DRIVERS: Our trusted and responsible driver-partners are Police Verified, and are engaged with us full-time. With thorough background checks, our trained drivers escort you to your destination safely.


MULTIPLE PAYMENT OPTIONS: You've got over 10 ways to pay, including credit and debit cards, UPI, Net banking, PayTM, MobiKwik, PayZapp, Freecharge and more. Just add money to your BLU WALLET and that's it. Pay for your rides, your way!


Steps to book a ride or an hourly rental:
1. Select your pickup and drop location respectively.
2. Select your pickup time and package (in case of hourly rentals). You can book 45 minutes to 48 hours in advance.
3. Select your payment method.

5. Enjoy your ride and get down at the destination, refreshed. Pay through cash/wallet after completing your ride.

Steps to book a ride from IGI Terminal 3:
1. Head to BluSmart Pickup Zone at Level 1, Multi-Level Car Parking (above Uber and Ola Pickup zones).
2. Generate a PIN instantly from the kiosk or BluSmart app. Or use the one generated during ride scheduling.
3. Get into the first available cab and share the PIN with the driver.
4. Enjoy your ride and get down at the destination. Pay through cash/wallet after completing your ride.

- We're launching Pickup Notes - a fast and convenient way for you to tell your driver about the pickup location whereabouts.
- We've introduced affordable tiered pricing for Airport rides that'll best suit your needs.
- Bug fixes and overall experience improvements.

title: BluSmart: Book Safe & Sanitized Electric Cabs

container.value: 1207 TO 1212,A2,PALLADIUM,NR.ORCHID WOOD, OPP. DIVYABHASKAR, CORPORATE RD, MAKARBA, AHMEDABAD, Ahmedabad, Gujarat, India, 380015

creator: BluSmart Mobility Tech Private Ltd.
descriptionHtml:
Use BluSmart to enjoy 100% Electric, Safe, & Reliable rides and rentals for all your travel needs in Gurugram, IGI Airport, and Delhi upto Dwarka, Vasant Kunj, Delhi Cantt, & South Ex! at FLAT fares starting at just ₹99! BluSmart is the first of its kind, all-electric cab platform, that provides noiseless emission-free electric sedans and unlocks an era of smart urban electric mobility.


At this crucial time, we understand the importance of Responsible Mobility and have revamped our services to set new safety standards across India and Asia. BluSmart is the only cab service where you will never face surge pricing, high ETAs, driver cancellations, unclean and uncomfortable cabs.


Why ride in a BluSmart Cab?


SAFE & SANITIZED: All BluSmart cabs are sanitized before every ride. Car sanitization time is updated on a regular basis and is mentioned on the app.

MANDATORY MASKS: BluSmart requires all drivers and riders to wear a mask on trips. Don't have one? Book one before or during your ride.
IN-CAB SANITIZER: Good hygiene is in our hands. That's why we've installed a hand sanitizer for our riders in all our cabs.


SAFETY SEPARATORS: Driver safety-cockpits have been installed in all BluSmart cabs to maintain adequate social distancing between the driver and the rider.


MINIMUM SURFACE CONTACT: To minimize surface contact, our driver-partners always open the door for our riders.


ZERO TAILPIPE EMISSIONS: All our cars are electric and have zero-tailpipe emission, unlike other CNG/diesel cabs. At BluSmart, our aim is to build a greener future.


NO SURGE PRICING: No variability in fares! We operate on a fixed tiered pricing model starting at flat ₹99.


RELIABLE, ON-TIME SERVICE GUARANTEE: We are on time, every time. We make sure that your cab reaches your pickup location 5 minutes before your scheduled pickup time.


PREMIUM, NOISELESS CABS: We ensure that you get a clean, well-maintained, noiseless vehicle each time. All vehicles are vibration-free, premium sedans with large boot space.


RIDES & HOURLY RENTALS: Whether you need to ride to work and reach ON TIME, or be out & about to pick up groceries and run a few errands without having to switch between multiple cabs for the sake of hygiene and safety, we've got a BluSmart for every use!


TRUSTED DRIVERS: Our trusted and responsible driver-partners are Police Verified, and are engaged with us full-time. With thorough background checks, our trained drivers escort you to your destination safely.


MULTIPLE PAYMENT OPTIONS: You've got over 10 ways to pay, including credit and debit cards, UPI, Net banking, PayTM, MobiKwik, PayZapp, Freecharge and more. Just add money to your BLU WALLET and that's it. Pay for your rides, your way!


Steps to book a ride or an hourly rental:
1. Select your pickup and drop location respectively.
2. Select your pickup time and package (in case of hourly rentals). You can book 45 minutes to 48 hours in advance.
3. Select your payment method.
4. Confirm your ride. No need to worry about driver cancellation. Driver will arrive at your pickup location 5 minutes before the scheduled time.
5. Enjoy your ride and get down at the destination, refreshed. Pay through cash/wallet after completing your ride.

Steps to book a ride from IGI Terminal 3:
1. Head to BluSmart Pickup Zone at Level 1, Multi-Level Car Parking (above Uber and Ola Pickup zones).
2. Generate a PIN instantly from the kiosk or BluSmart app. Or use the one generated during ride scheduling.
3. Get into the first available cab and share the PIN with the driver.
4. Enjoy your ride and get down at the destination. Pay through cash/wallet after completing your ride.


Ride BluSmart ALL-ELECTRIC cabs and take India to a better, greener future.
Like us on FB: https://www.facebook.com/blusmartindia/
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/BluSmartIndia
Have any questions? Please write to us on support@blu-smart.com

BluSmart is the first of its kind, all-electric cab platform, that provides noiseless emission-free electric sedans and unlocks an era of smart urban electric mobility.


At this crucial time, we understand the importance of Responsible Mobility and have revamped our services to set new safety standards across India and Asia. BluSmart is the only cab service where you will never face surge pricing, high ETAs, driver cancellations, unclean and uncomfortable cabs.


Why ride in a BluSmart Cab?


SAFE & SANITIZED: All BluSmart cabs are sanitized before every ride. Car sanitization time is updated on a regular basis and is mentioned on the app.

MANDATORY MASKS: BluSmart requires all drivers and riders to wear a mask on trips. Don't have one? Book one before or during your ride.
IN-CAB SANITIZER: Good hygiene is in our hands. That's why we've installed a hand sanitizer for our riders in all our cabs.


SAFETY SEPARATORS: Driver safety-cockpits have been installed in all BluSmart cabs to maintain adequate social distancing between the driver and the rider.


MINIMUM SURFACE CONTACT: To minimize surface contact, our driver-partners always open the door for our riders.


ZERO TAILPIPE EMISSIONS: All our cars are electric and have zero-tailpipe emission, unlike other CNG/diesel cabs. At BluSmart, our aim is to build a greener future.


NO SURGE PRICING: No variability in fares! We operate on a fixed tiered pricing model starting at flat ₹99.


RELIABLE, ON-TIME SERVICE GUARANTEE: We are on time, every time. We make sure that your cab reaches your pickup location 5 minutes before your scheduled pickup time.


PREMIUM, NOISELESS CABS: We ensure that you get a clean, well-maintained, noiseless vehicle each time. All vehicles are vibration-free, premium sedans with large boot space.


RIDES & HOURLY RENTALS: Whether you need to ride to work and reach ON TIME, or be out & about to pick up groceries and run a few errands without having to switch between multiple cabs for the sake of hygiene and safety, we've got a BluSmart for every use!


TRUSTED DRIVERS: Our trusted and responsible driver-partners are Police Verified, and are engaged with us full-time. With thorough background checks, our trained drivers escort you to your destination safely.


MULTIPLE PAYMENT OPTIONS: You've got over 10 ways to pay, including credit and debit cards, UPI, Net banking, PayTM, MobiKwik, PayZapp, Freecharge and more. Just add money to your BLU WALLET and that's it. Pay for your rides, your way!


Steps to book a ride or an hourly rental:
1. Select your pickup and drop location respectively.
2. Select your pickup time and package (in case of hourly rentals). You can book 45 minutes to 48 hours in advance.
3. Select your payment method.
4. Confirm your ride. No need to worry about driver cancellation. Driver will arrive at your pickup location 5 minutes before the scheduled time.
5. Enjoy your ride and get down at the destination, refreshed. Pay through cash/wallet after completing your ride.

Steps to book a ride from IGI Terminal 3:
1. Head to BluSmart Pickup Zone at Level 1, Multi-Level Car Parking (above Uber and Ola Pickup zones).
2. Generate a PIN instantly from the kiosk or BluSmart app. Or use the one generated during ride scheduling.
3. Get into the first available cab and share the PIN with the driver.
4. Enjoy your ride and get down at the destination. Pay through cash/wallet after completing your ride.


Ride BluSmart ALL-ELECTRIC cabs and take India to a better, greener future.
Like us on FB: https://www.facebook.com/blusmartindia/
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/BluSmartIndia
Have any questions? Please write to us on support@blu-smart.com

RELIABLE, ON-TIME SERVICE GUARANTEE: We are on time, every time. We make sure that your cab reaches your pickup location 5 minutes before your scheduled pickup time.


PREMIUM, NOISELESS CABS: We ensure that you get a clean, well-maintained, noiseless vehicle each time. All vehicles are vibration-free, premium sedans with large boot space.


RIDES & HOURLY RENTALS: Whether you need to ride to work and reach ON TIME, or be out & about to pick up groceries and run a few errands without having to switch between multiple cabs for the sake of hygiene and safety, we've got a BluSmart for every use!


TRUSTED DRIVERS: Our trusted and responsible driver-partners are Police Verified, and are engaged with us full-time. With thorough background checks, our trained drivers escort you to your destination safely.


MULTIPLE PAYMENT OPTIONS: You've got over 10 ways to pay, including credit and debit cards, UPI, Net banking, PayTM, MobiKwik, PayZapp, Freecharge and more. Just add money to your BLU WALLET and that's it. Pay for your rides, your way!


Steps to book a ride or an hourly rental:
1. Select your pickup and drop location respectively.
2. Select your pickup time and package (in case of hourly rentals). You can book 45 minutes to 48 hours in advance.
3. Select your payment method.
4. Confirm your ride. No need to worry about driver cancellation. Driver will arrive at your pickup location 5 minutes before the scheduled time.
5. Enjoy your ride and get down at the destination, refreshed. Pay through cash/wallet after completing your ride.

Steps to book a ride from IGI Terminal 3:
1. Head to BluSmart Pickup Zone at Level 1, Multi-Level Car Parking (above Uber and Ola Pickup zones).
2. Generate a PIN instantly from the kiosk or BluSmart app. Or use the one generated during ride scheduling.
3. Get into the first available cab and share the PIN with the driver.
4. Enjoy your ride and get down at the destination. Pay through cash/wallet after completing your ride.


Ride BluSmart ALL-ELECTRIC cabs and take India to a better, greener future.
Like us on FB: https://www.facebook.com/blusmartindia/
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/BluSmartIndia
Have any questions? Please write to us on support@blu-smart.com

creator: BluSmart Mobility Tech Private Ltd.
descriptionHtml:
BluSmart is India’s first all-electric cab service. It’s time for you to leave behind the conventional way of travelling with CNG or diesel cabs & switch to BluSmart electric cabs, the best taxi service in Gurgaon & Delhi NCR. If you’re looking for safe, reliable & affordable IGI Airport taxi services or a taxi in Gurgaon, Delhi up to Dwarka, Vasant Kunj & Vasant Vihar then use BluSmart to enjoy flat fares starting from just ₹99.

Our highest-rated electric cab booking app allows you to schedule cabs at any time you want. Also, we guarantee zero surge prices & zero cab cancellations.

We are committed to providing the best taxi service in Gurgaon & Delhi with noiseless & eco-friendly electric cabs. The well-being of our riders has always been of utmost importance to us, that’s why we’re operating hygienic & safe cabs in Gurgaon & Delhi with elevated safety standards.

Why choose BluSmart cab booking app?

Safe & sanitized cabs: All BluSmart electric cabs are sanitized before every ride. Car sanitization time is updated on a regular basis and is mentioned on the BluSmart cab booking app.

Mandatory masks: We require our riders and drivers to wear a mask on all trips.

In-cab sanitizers: Good hygiene practices make us the best taxi service in Gurgaon & Delhi that’s why all our cabs are equipped with sanitizers.

Minimum surface contact: To minimize surface contact, our cab drivers open the door for the riders.

Zero emissions: We are the best taxi service in Gurgaon & Delhi because our electric cabs don’t harm the environment with toxic emissions.

No surge prices: Opt to ride in the most affordable & safe cabs in Gurgaon, Delhi NCR because we operate on a fixed, km-based fares which are displayed on the BluSmart cab booking app.

Premium cabs: Our electric cabs are premium, noiseless sedans with driver safety cockpits.

Trusted drivers: Our responsible cab drivers are Police verified & are engaged with us full time. We have also initiated a vaccination drive for them. You can see a Golden Badge in the BluSmart cab booking app for all vaccinated driver-partners.

Rides & Hourly Rentals: Whether you need a ride to work, or have to get groceries & run a few errands without having to switch between multiple cabs for the sake of hygiene and safety, we've got a BluSmart for every use!

Convenient airport taxi services: Need an airport taxi in Gurgaon or Delhi NCR? BluSmart’s airport taxi services are hassle-free because there are no last-minute cancellations. Our electric cabs also have a jumbo boot space for all your luggage.

Multiple payment options: With over 10 ways to pay, including credit and debit cards, UPI, Net banking, PayTM, MobiKwik, PayZapp, Freecharge you can make cashless payments through our BluSmart cab booking app. You can also add money to your BLU WALLET and pay for your cab ride.



Steps for hourly rental taxi booking or cab ride :
1. Select your pickup and drop location respectively.
2. Select your pickup time and package (in case of hourly rentals). You can book 45 minutes to 48 hours in advance.
3. Select your payment method.
4. Confirm your ride. No need to worry about driver cancellation. The driver will arrive at your pickup location 5 minutes before the scheduled time.
6. Enjoy your ride and get down at the destination, refreshed. Pay through cash/wallet after completing your ride.

Steps to book airport taxi services:
1. Head to BluSmart Pickup Zone at Level 2, Multi-Level Car Parking (above Uber and Ola Pickup zones).
2. Generate a PIN instantly from the kiosk or BluSmart app. Or use the one generated during the ride scheduled.
3. Get into the first available cab and share the PIN with the driver.
5. Enjoy your ride and get down at the destination. Pay through cash/wallet after completing your ride.

Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/BluSmartIndia
Have questions? Please write to us on support@blu-smart.com

Convenient airport taxi services: Need an airport taxi in Gurgaon or Delhi NCR? BluSmart’s airport taxi services are hassle-free because there are no last-minute cancellations. Our electric cabs also have a jumbo boot space for all your luggage.

Steps for hourly rental taxi booking or cab ride :
1. Select your pickup and drop location respectively.
2. Select your pickup time and package (in case of hourly rentals). You can book 30 minutes to 48 hours in advance.

6. Enjoy your ride and get down at the destination, refreshed. Pay through cash/wallet after completing your ride.

Steps to book airport taxi services:

2. Generate a PIN instantly from the kiosk or BluSmart app. Or use the one generated during the ride scheduled.

title: BluSmart: Book Safe & Sanitized Electric Cabs

container.value: 1207 TO 1212,A2,PALLADIUM,NR.ORCHID WOOD, OPP. DIVYABHASKAR, CORPORATE RD, MAKARBA, AHMEDABAD, Ahmedabad, Gujarat, India, 380015

creator: BluSmart Mobility Tech Private Ltd.
descriptionHtml:
BluSmart is India’s first all-electric cab service. It’s time for you to leave behind the conventional way of travelling with CNG or diesel cabs & switch to BluSmart electric cabs, the best taxi service in Gurgaon & Delhi NCR. If you’re looking for safe, reliable & affordable IGI Airport taxi services or a taxi in Gurgaon, Delhi up to Dwarka, Vasant Kunj & Vasant Vihar then use BluSmart to enjoy flat fares starting from just ₹99.

Our highest-rated electric cab booking app allows you to schedule cabs at any time you want. Also, we guarantee zero surge prices & zero cab cancellations.

We are committed to providing the best taxi service in Gurgaon & Delhi with noiseless & eco-friendly electric cabs. The well-being of our riders has always been of utmost importance to us, that’s why we’re operating hygienic & safe cabs in Gurgaon & Delhi with elevated safety standards.

Why choose BluSmart cab booking app?

Safe & sanitized cabs: All BluSmart electric cabs are sanitized before every ride. Car sanitization time is updated on a regular basis and is mentioned on the BluSmart cab booking app.

Mandatory masks: We require our riders and drivers to wear a mask on all trips.

In-cab sanitizers: Good hygiene practices make us the best taxi service in Gurgaon & Delhi that’s why all our cabs are equipped with sanitizers.

Minimum surface contact: To minimize surface contact, our cab drivers open the door for the riders.

Zero emissions: We are the best taxi service in Gurgaon & Delhi because our electric cabs don’t harm the environment with toxic emissions.

No surge prices: Opt to ride in the most affordable & safe cabs in Gurgaon, Delhi NCR because we operate on a fixed, km-based fares which are displayed on the BluSmart cab booking app.

Premium cabs: Our electric cabs are premium, noiseless sedans with driver safety cockpits.

Trusted drivers: Our responsible cab drivers are Police verified & are engaged with us full time. We have also initiated a vaccination drive for them. You can see a Golden Badge in the BluSmart cab booking app for all vaccinated driver-partners.

Rides & Hourly Rentals: Whether you need a ride to work, or have to get groceries & run a few errands without having to switch between multiple cabs for the sake of hygiene and safety, we've got a BluSmart for every use!

Convenient airport taxi services: Need an airport taxi in Gurgaon or Delhi NCR? BluSmart’s airport taxi services are hassle-free because there are no last-minute cancellations. Our electric cabs also have a jumbo boot space for all your luggage.

Multiple payment options: With over 10 ways to pay, including credit and debit cards, UPI, Net banking, PayTM, MobiKwik, PayZapp, Freecharge you can make cashless payments through our BluSmart cab booking app. You can also add money to your BLU WALLET and pay for your cab ride.



Steps for hourly rental taxi booking or cab ride :
1. Select your pickup and drop location respectively.
2. Select your pickup time and package (in case of hourly rentals). You can book 30 minutes to 48 hours in advance.
3. Select your payment method.
4. Confirm your ride. No need to worry about driver cancellation. The driver will arrive at your pickup location 5 minutes before the scheduled time.
6. Enjoy your ride and get down at the destination, refreshed. Pay through cash/wallet after completing your ride.

Steps to book airport taxi services:
1. Head to BluSmart Pickup Zone at Level 1, Multi-Level Car Parking (above Uber and Ola Pickup zones).
2. Generate a PIN instantly from the kiosk or BluSmart app. Or use the one generated during the ride scheduled.
3. Get into the first available cab and share the PIN with the driver.
5. Enjoy your ride and get down at the destination. Pay through cash/wallet after completing your ride.


Like us on FB: https://www.facebook.com/blusmartindia/
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/BluSmartIndia
Have questions? Please write to us on support@blu-smart.com

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
For the times when mom says, “Beta, bua ke ghar drop kar de”, when your NRI cousin needs a ride from the airport or when your not-so-sober friend has to be dropped home during those wee hours, we got you!
With the new book-for-someone-else feature, request the safest & most reliable cab in town for your loved ones. The person you’ve booked for will receive SMS updates even if they don’t have the app. Convenient, right? And you can track their ride for your satisfaction 🙂

Multiple payment options: With over 10 ways to pay, including credit and debit cards, UPI, Net banking, PayTM, MobiKwik, PayZapp, Freecharge you can make cashless payments through our BluSmart cab booking app. You can also add money to your BLU WALLET and pay for your cab ride.



Steps for hourly rental taxi booking or cab ride :
1. Select your pickup and drop location respectively.
2. Select your pickup time and package (in case of hourly rentals). You can book 30 minutes to 48 hours in advance.
3. Select your payment method.
4. Confirm your ride. No need to worry about driver cancellation. The driver will arrive at your pickup location 5 minutes before the scheduled time.
6. Enjoy your ride and get down at the destination, refreshed. Pay through cash/wallet after completing your ride.

Steps to book airport taxi services:
1. Head to BluSmart Pickup Zone at Level 1, Multi-Level Car Parking (above Uber and Ola Pickup zones).
2. Generate a PIN instantly from the kiosk or BluSmart app. Or use the one generated during the ride scheduled.
3. Get into the first available cab and share the PIN with the driver.
5. Enjoy your ride and get down at the destination. Pay through cash/wallet after completing your ride.

title: BluSmart: Safe Electric Cabs

container.value: 1207 TO 1212,A2,PALLADIUM,NR.ORCHID WOOD, OPP. DIVYABHASKAR, CORPORATE RD, MAKARBA, AHMEDABAD, Ahmedabad, Gujarat, India, 380015

creator: BluSmart Mobility Tech Private Ltd.
descriptionHtml:
BluSmart is India’s first all-electric cab service. It’s time for you to leave behind the conventional way of travelling with CNG or diesel cabs & switch to BluSmart electric cabs, the best taxi service in Gurgaon & Delhi NCR. If you’re looking for safe, reliable & affordable IGI Airport taxi services or a taxi in Gurgaon, Delhi up to Dwarka, Vasant Kunj & Vasant Vihar then use BluSmart to enjoy flat fares starting from just ₹99.

Our highest-rated electric cab booking app allows you to schedule cabs at any time you want. Also, we guarantee zero surge prices & zero cab cancellations.

We are committed to providing the best taxi service in Gurgaon & Delhi with noiseless & eco-friendly electric cabs. The well-being of our riders is of utmost importance to us, that’s why we’re operating hygienic & safe cabs in Gurgaon & Delhi with elevated safety standards.

Why choose BluSmart cab booking app?

Safe & sanitized cabs: All BluSmart electric cabs are sanitized before every ride. Car sanitization time is updated on a regular basis and is mentioned on the BluSmart cab booking app.

Mandatory masks: We require our riders and drivers to wear a mask on all trips.

In-cab sanitizers: Good hygiene practices make us the best taxi service in Gurgaon & Delhi that’s why all our cabs are equipped with sanitizers.

Minimum surface contact: To minimize surface contact, our cab drivers open the door for the riders.

Zero emissions: We are the best taxi service in Gurgaon & Delhi because our electric cabs don’t harm the environment with toxic emissions.

No surge prices: Opt to ride in the most affordable & safe cabs in Gurgaon, Delhi NCR because we operate on a fixed, km-based fares which are displayed on the BluSmart cab booking app.


Trusted drivers: Our responsible cab drivers are police verified & are engaged with us full time. We have also initiated a vaccination drive for them. You can see a Golden Badge in the BluSmart cab booking app for all vaccinated driver-partners.

Rides & Hourly Rentals: Whether you need a ride to work, or have to get groceries & run a few errands without having to switch between multiple cabs for the sake of safety, we've got a BluSmart for every use! Now, you can also request for premium SUVs like MG eZS or Hyundai Kona for your rental ride,

Convenient airport taxi services: Need an airport taxi in Gurgaon or Delhi NCR? BluSmart’s airport taxi services are hassle-free because there are no last-minute cancellations. Our electric cabs also have a jumbo boot space for all your luggage. You can directly book your cab from T2 & T3 at the IGI airport.

Multiple payment options: With over 10 ways to pay, including credit and debit cards, UPI, Net banking, PayTM, MobiKwik, PayZapp, Freecharge you can make cashless payments through our BluSmart cab booking app. You can also add money to your BLU WALLET and pay for your cab ride.



Steps for hourly rental taxi booking or cab ride :
1. Select your pickup and drop location respectively.
2. Select your pickup time and package (in case of hourly rentals).
3. Select your payment method.
4. Confirm your ride. The driver will arrive at your pickup location 5 minutes before the scheduled time.
5. Enjoy your ride and get down at the destination. Pay through cash/wallet after completing your ride.

Steps to book airport taxi services:
1. At T3, head to BluSmart Pickup Zone at Level 2, Multi-Level Car Parking (above Uber and Ola Pickup zones).
Or
At T2, head to the BluSmart kiosk at the car parking area.
2. Generate a PIN instantly from the BluSmart app. Or use the one generated during the ride scheduled.
3. Get into the first available cab and share the PIN with the driver.
4. Enjoy your ride and get down at the destination. Pay through cash/wallet after completing your ride.


Like us on FB: https://www.facebook.com/blusmartindia/
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/BluSmartIndia
Have questions? Please write to us on support@blu-smart.com

It’s time for you to leave behind the conventional way of travelling with CNG or diesel cabs & switch to BluSmart electric cabs, the best taxi service in Gurgaon & Delhi NCR. If you’re looking for safe, reliable & affordable IGI Airport taxi services or a taxi in Gurgaon, Delhi up to Dwarka, Vasant Kunj & Vasant Vihar then use BluSmart to enjoy flat fares starting from just ₹99.

Our highest-rated electric cab booking app allows you to schedule cabs at any time you want. Also, we guarantee zero surge prices & zero cab cancellations.

We are committed to providing the best taxi service in Gurgaon & Delhi with noiseless & eco-friendly electric cabs. The well-being of our riders has always been of utmost importance to us, that’s why we’re operating hygienic & safe cabs in Gurgaon & Delhi with elevated safety standards.

Why choose BluSmart cab booking app?

Safe & sanitized cabs: With top-of-the-line safety & hygiene protocols in place, we ensure that our vehicles are spick & span for each ride.

Mandatory masks: We require our riders and drivers to wear a mask on all trips.

In-cab sanitizers: Good hygiene practices make us the best taxi service in Gurgaon & Delhi that’s why all our cabs are equipped with sanitizers.

Minimum surface contact: To minimize surface contact, our cab drivers open the door for the riders.

Zero emissions: We are the best taxi service in Gurgaon & Delhi because our electric cabs don’t harm the environment with toxic emissions.

No surge prices: Opt to ride in the most affordable & safe cabs in Gurgaon, Delhi NCR because we operate on a fixed, km-based fares which are displayed on the BluSmart cab booking app.

Premium cabs: Our electric cabs are premium, noiseless sedans with driver safety cockpits.

Trusted drivers: Our responsible cab drivers are Police verified & are engaged with us full time. We have also initiated a vaccination drive for them. You can see a Golden Badge in the BluSmart cab booking app for all vaccinated driver-partners.

Rides & Hourly Rentals: Whether you need a ride to work, or have to get groceries & run a few errands without having to switch between multiple cabs for the sake of hygiene and safety, we've got a BluSmart for every use!

Convenient airport taxi services: Need an airport taxi in Gurgaon or Delhi NCR? BluSmart’s airport taxi services are hassle-free because there are no last-minute cancellations. Our electric cabs also have a jumbo boot space for all your luggage.

Multiple payment options: With over 10 ways to pay, including credit and debit cards, UPI, Net banking, PayTM, MobiKwik, PayZapp, Freecharge you can make cashless payments through our BluSmart cab booking app. You can also add money to your BLU WALLET and pay for your cab ride.



Steps for hourly rental taxi booking or cab ride :
1. Select your pickup and drop location respectively.
2. Select your pickup time and package (in case of hourly rentals). You can book 45 minutes to 48 hours in advance.
3. Select your payment method.
4. Confirm your ride. No need to worry about driver cancellation. The driver will arrive at your pickup location 5 minutes before the scheduled time.
6. Enjoy your ride and get down at the destination, refreshed. Pay through cash/wallet after completing your ride.

Steps to book airport taxi services:
1. Head to BluSmart Pickup Zone at Level 2, Multi-Level Car Parking (above Uber and Ola Pickup zones).
2. Generate a PIN instantly from the kiosk or BluSmart app. Or use the one generated during the ride scheduled.
3. Get into the first available cab and share the PIN with the driver.
5. Enjoy your ride and get down at the destination. Pay through cash/wallet after completing your ride.


Like us on FB: https://www.facebook.com/blusmartindia/
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/BluSmartIndia
Have questions? Please write to us on support@blu-smart.com

Steps for hourly rental taxi booking or cab ride :
1. Select your pickup and drop location respectively.

Steps to book airport taxi services:

Every time you’ll book a multi-hour Premium Rental, a swanky MG eZS or Hyundai Kona will come to pick you up. Get ready to experience lavish comfort like never before with top-rated chauffeurs, plush cars & the good ol’ BluSmart promise of zero surge, zero cancellations & zero emissions.
Get ready to arrive in style. Get ready to arrive in a Premium Rental.

title: BluSmart: Safe Electric Cabs

container.value: 1207 TO 1212,A2,PALLADIUM,NR.ORCHID WOOD, OPP. DIVYABHASKAR, CORPORATE RD, MAKARBA, AHMEDABAD, Ahmedabad, Gujarat, India, 380015

creator: BluSmart Mobility Tech Private Ltd.
descriptionHtml:
BluSmart is India’s first all-electric cab service. It’s time for you to leave behind the conventional way of travelling with CNG or diesel cabs & switch to BluSmart electric cabs, the best taxi service in Gurgaon, Delhi NCR & Bengaluru. If you’re looking for safe, reliable & affordable Airport taxi services or a taxi in Gurgaon & areas of Delhi & Bengaluru then use BluSmart to enjoy flat fares, round the clock.

Our highest-rated electric cab booking app allows you to schedule cabs at any time you want. Also, we guarantee zero surge prices & zero cab cancellations.

We are committed to providing the best taxi service in Gurgaon, Delhi & Bengaluru with noiseless & eco-friendly BluSmart cabs. The well-being of our riders has always been of utmost importance to us, that’s why we’re operating hygienic & safe cabs in Gurgaon ,Delhi & Bengaluru with elevated safety standards.

Why choose BluSmart cab booking app?

• Safe & sanitized cabs: With top-of-the-line safety & hygiene protocols in place, we ensure that our vehicles are spick & span for each ride.

• Minimum surface contact: To minimize surface contact, our cab drivers open the door for the riders.

• Zero emissions: We are the best taxi service in Gurgaon, Delhi & Bengaluru because our electric cabs don’t harm the environment with toxic emissions.

• No surge prices: Opt to ride in the most affordable & safe cabs in Gurgaon, Delhi NCR & Bengaluru because we operate on a fixed, km-based fares which are displayed on the BluSmart cab booking app.

• Premium cabs: Our electric cabs are premium, noiseless sedans & SUVs.

• Trusted drivers: Our responsible cab drivers are Police verified & are engaged with us full time. We have also initiated a vaccination drive for them. You can see a Golden Badge in the BluSmart cab booking app for all vaccinated driver-partners.

• Rides & Hourly Rentals: Whether you need a ride to work, or have to get groceries without having to switch between multiple cabs for the sake of hygiene and safety, we've got a BluSmart for every use!

• Convenient airport taxi services: Need an airport taxi in Gurgaon, Delhi NCR or Bengaluru? BluSmart’s airport taxi services are hassle-free because there are no last-minute cancellations. Our electric cabs also have a jumbo boot space for all your luggage.

• Multiple payment options: With over 10 ways to pay, including credit and debit cards, UPI, Net banking, PayTM, MobiKwik, PayZapp you can make cashless payments through our BluSmart cab booking app. You can also add money to your BLU WALLET and pay for your cab ride.

Steps for hourly rental taxi booking or cab ride :
1. Select your pickup and drop location respectively.
2. Select your pickup time and package (in case of hourly rentals). You can book 45 minutes to 48 hours in advance.
3. Select your payment method.
4. Confirm your ride. No need to worry about driver cancellation. The driver will arrive at your pickup location 5 minutes before the scheduled time.
5. Enjoy your ride and get down at the destination, refreshed. Pay through cash/wallet after completing your ride.

How to book airport taxi services at IGI Airport:
1. Head to BluSmart Pickup Zone at Level 2, Multi-Level Car Parking (above Uber and Ola Pickup zones) at T3 or walk over to the BluSmart kiosk at T1 & T2.
2. Generate a PIN instantly from the kiosk or BluSmart app. Or use the one generated during the ride scheduled.
3. Get into the first available cab and share the PIN with the driver.
4. Enjoy your ride and get down at the destination. Pay through cash/wallet after completing your ride.

How to book taxi service at Bengaluru Airport:
1. Book a cab through the BluSmart app.
2. Head to the arrival gate & share your 6-digit pin to board a cab.
3. If you don’t have the app, ushers will assist in booking the cab.


Like us on FB: https://www.facebook.com/blusmartindia/
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/BluSmartIndia
Have questions? Please write to us on support@blu-smart.com

Why choose BluSmart cab booking app?

• Safe & sanitized cabs: With top-of-the-line safety & hygiene protocols in place, we ensure that our vehicles are spick & span for each ride.

• Minimum surface contact: To minimize surface contact, our cab drivers open the door for the riders.

• Zero emissions: We are the best taxi service in Gurgaon, Delhi & Bengaluru because our electric cabs don’t harm the environment with toxic emissions.

• No surge prices: Opt to ride in the most affordable & safe cabs in Gurgaon, Delhi NCR & Bengaluru because we operate on a fixed, km-based fares which are displayed on the BluSmart cab booking app.

• Premium cabs: Our electric cabs are premium, noiseless sedans & SUVs.

• Trusted drivers: Our responsible cab drivers are Police verified & are engaged with us full time. We have also initiated a vaccination drive for them. You can see a Golden Badge in the BluSmart cab booking app for all vaccinated driver-partners.

• Rides & Hourly Rentals: Whether you need a ride to work, or have to get groceries without having to switch between multiple cabs for the sake of hygiene and safety, we've got a BluSmart for every use!

• Convenient airport taxi services: Need an airport taxi in Gurgaon, Delhi NCR or Bengaluru? BluSmart’s airport taxi services are hassle-free because there are no last-minute cancellations. Our electric cabs also have a jumbo boot space for all your luggage.

• Multiple payment options: With over 10 ways to pay, including credit and debit cards, UPI, Net banking, PayTM, MobiKwik, PayZapp you can make cashless payments through our BluSmart cab booking app. You can also add money to your BLU WALLET and pay for your cab ride.

Steps for hourly rental taxi booking or cab ride :
1. Select your pickup and drop location respectively.
2. Select your pickup time and package (in case of hourly rentals). You can book 45 minutes to 48 hours in advance.
3. Select your payment method.
4. Confirm your ride. No need to worry about driver cancellation. The driver will arrive at your pickup location 5 minutes before the scheduled time.
5. Enjoy your ride and get down at the destination, refreshed. Pay through cash/wallet after completing your ride.

How to book airport taxi services at IGI Airport:
1. Head to BluSmart Pickup Zone at Level 2, Multi-Level Car Parking (above Uber and Ola Pickup zones) at T3 or walk over to the BluSmart kiosk at T1 & T2.
2. Generate a PIN instantly from the kiosk or BluSmart app. Or use the one generated during the ride scheduled.
3. Get into the first available cab and share the PIN with the driver.
4. Enjoy your ride and get down at the destination. Pay through cash/wallet after completing your ride.

How to book taxi service at Bengaluru Airport:
1. Book a cab through the BluSmart app.
2. Head to the arrival gate & share your 6-digit pin to board a cab.

Steps for hourly rental taxi booking or cab ride :
1. Select your pickup and drop location respectively.
2. Select your pickup time and package (in case of hourly rentals). You can book 45 minutes to 48 hours in advance.

4. Confirm your ride. No need to worry about driver cancellation. The driver will arrive at your pickup location 5 minutes before the scheduled time.
5. Enjoy your ride and get down at the destination, refreshed. Pay through cash/wallet after completing your ride.

How to book airport taxi services at IGI Airport:

descriptionHtml:
BluSmart is India’s first all-electric cab service. BluSmart cabs are revolutionizing the way people travel in cabs in urban India. Our noiseless, eco-friendly cabs are also available for airport transfers to & from the IGI Airport, Delhi & Kempegowda International Airport Bengaluru.

BluSmart’s highest-rated cab booking app allows you to schedule your cab up to 48 hours in advance, anytime you want. Moreover, BluSmart guarantees zero driver cancellations and zero surge prices, all the time.

We are serviceable in Gurgaon, and areas of Delhi (South Delhi, Dwarka, Vikaspuri, Janakpuri, NDLS, North Delhi up to Connaught Place, Chandni Chowk, etc.)
In Bengaluru, pickups & drops are available at the Bengaluru airport, HSR Layout, Koramangala, Indiranagar, Domlur, Lakkasandra, Kudlu, Tilak Nagar & Kodihalli.

Why choose BluSmart?

• Flat fares: No matter what time of the day or night, you will only be charged flat, km-based fares, with no unexpected surge prices.

• No cancellations: Travel with utmost peace of mind 24X7 because our driver-partners will never cancel your ride.

• Professional driver-partners: Our responsible cab drivers are police verified & engaged with us full-time. They also open the cab door for the riders to minimize surface contact.

• Safe & sanitised cabs: With top-of-the-line safety & hygiene protocols in place, we ensure that our vehicles are spick & span for each ride.

• Scheduled cabs: Travelling to the office every day? Schedule your BluSmart in advance & enjoy a seamless experience.

• Rides & Hourly Rentals: Whether you need a ride to work, or have to get groceries & run a few errands without having to switch between multiple cabs for the sake of hygiene and safety, we've got a BluSmart for every use!

• Convenient airport taxi services: Need an airport taxi in Gurgaon, Delhi NCR or Bengaluru? BluSmart’s airport taxi services are hassle-free because there are no last-minute cancellations & you can schedule them up to 30 days in advance. Our electric cabs also have a jumbo boot space for all your luggage.

• Multiple payment options: With over 10 ways to pay, including credit and debit cards, UPI, Net banking, Paytm, MobiKwik, PayZapp, and Freecharge you can make cashless payments through our BluSmart cab booking app. You can also add money to your BLU WALLET to pay for the cab ride.

Steps for hourly rental taxi booking or cab ride :
1. Select your pickup and drop location respectively.
2. Select your pickup time and package (in case of hourly rentals). You can book 45 minutes to 48 hours in advance.
3. Select your payment method.
4. Confirm your ride. No need to worry about driver cancellation. 
5. Enjoy your ride and get down at the destination, refreshed. Pay through cash/wallet after completing your ride.

Steps to book airport taxi services:
1. At the IGI Airport, head to BluSmart Pickup Zone at Level 2, Multi-Level Car Parking (above Uber and Ola Pickup zones) at T3 or walk over to the BluSmart kiosk at T1 & T2.
2. Generate a PIN instantly from the kiosk or BluSmart app. Or use the one generated during the ride scheduled.
3. Get into the first available cab and share the PIN with the driver.
4. Enjoy your ride and get down at the destination. Pay through cash/wallet after completing your ride.
5. For pickups from the Bengaluru Airport, schedule your cab, enter your destination & voila!

title: BluSmart: Safe Electric Cabs

container.value: 1207 TO 1212,A2,PALLADIUM,NR.ORCHID WOOD, OPP. DIVYABHASKAR, CORPORATE RD, MAKARBA, AHMEDABAD, Ahmedabad, Gujarat, India, 380015

creator: BluSmart Mobility Tech Private Ltd.
descriptionHtml:
BluSmart is India’s first all-electric cab service. BluSmart cabs are revolutionizing the way people travel in cabs in urban India. If you are looking for a safe, reliable, and sustainable taxi service in Delhi NCR or Bengaluru, look no further. Our noiseless, eco-friendly cabs are also available for airport transfers to & from the IGI Airport, Delhi & Kempegowda International Airport Bengaluru.

BluSmart’s highest-rated cab booking app allows you to schedule your cab up to 48 hours in advance, anytime you want. Moreover, BluSmart guarantees zero driver cancellations and zero surge prices, all the time.

We are serviceable in Gurgaon, and areas of Delhi (South Delhi, Dwarka, Vikaspuri, Janakpuri, NDLS, North Delhi up to Connaught Place, Chandni Chowk, etc.)
In Bengaluru, pickups & drops are available at the Bengaluru airport, HSR Layout, Koramangala, Indiranagar, Domlur, Lakkasandra, Kudlu, Tilak Nagar & Kodihalli.

Why choose BluSmart?

• Flat fares: No matter what time of the day or night, you will only be charged flat, km-based fares, with no unexpected surge prices.

• No cancellations: Travel with utmost peace of mind 24X7 because our driver-partners will never cancel your ride.

• Professional driver-partners: Our responsible cab drivers are police verified & engaged with us full-time. They also open the cab door for the riders to minimize surface contact.

• Safe & sanitised cabs: With top-of-the-line safety & hygiene protocols in place, we ensure that our vehicles are spick & span for each ride.

• Scheduled cabs: Travelling to the office every day? Schedule your BluSmart in advance & enjoy a seamless experience.

• Rides & Hourly Rentals: Whether you need a ride to work, or have to get groceries & run a few errands without having to switch between multiple cabs for the sake of hygiene and safety, we've got a BluSmart for every use!

• Convenient airport taxi services: Need an airport taxi in Gurgaon, Delhi NCR or Bengaluru? BluSmart’s airport taxi services are hassle-free because there are no last-minute cancellations & you can schedule them up to 30 days in advance. Our electric cabs also have a jumbo boot space for all your luggage.

• Multiple payment options: With over 10 ways to pay, including credit and debit cards, UPI, Net banking, Paytm, MobiKwik, PayZapp, and Freecharge you can make cashless payments through our BluSmart cab booking app. You can also add money to your BLU WALLET to pay for the cab ride.

Steps for hourly rental taxi booking or cab ride :
1. Select your pickup and drop location respectively.
2. Select your pickup time and package (in case of hourly rentals). You can book 45 minutes to 48 hours in advance.
3. Select your payment method.
4. Confirm your ride. No need to worry about driver cancellation. 
5. Enjoy your ride and get down at the destination, refreshed. Pay through cash/wallet after completing your ride.

Steps to book airport taxi services:
1. At the IGI Airport, head to BluSmart Pickup Zone at Level 2, Multi-Level Car Parking (above Uber and Ola Pickup zones) at T3 or walk over to the BluSmart kiosk at T1 & T2.
2. Generate a PIN instantly from the kiosk or BluSmart app. Or use the one generated during the ride scheduled.
3. Get into the first available cab and share the PIN with the driver.
4. Enjoy your ride and get down at the destination. Pay through cash/wallet after completing your ride.
5. For pickups from the Bengaluru Airport, schedule your cab, enter your destination & voila!


Follow us on Instagram: https://instagram.com/blusmartindia
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/BluSmartIndia
Have questions? Please write to us on support@blu-smart.com

BluSmart’s airport taxi services are hassle-free because there are no last-minute cancellations & you can schedule them up to 30 days in advance. Our electric cabs also have a jumbo boot space for all your luggage.

• Multiple payment options: With over 10 ways to pay, including credit and debit cards, UPI, Net banking, Paytm, MobiKwik, PayZapp, and Freecharge you can make cashless payments through our BluSmart cab booking app. You can also add money to your BLU WALLET to pay for the cab ride.

Steps for hourly rental taxi booking or cab ride :
1. Select your pickup and drop location respectively.
2. Select your pickup time and package (in case of hourly rentals). You can book 45 minutes to 48 hours in advance.
3. Select your payment method.
4. Confirm your ride. No need to worry about driver cancellation. 
5. Enjoy your ride and get down at the destination, refreshed. Pay through cash/wallet after completing your ride.

Steps to book airport taxi services:
1. At the IGI Airport, head to BluSmart Pickup Zone at Level 2, Multi-Level Car Parking (above Uber and Ola Pickup zones) at T3 or walk over to the BluSmart kiosk at T1 & T2.
2. Generate a PIN instantly from the kiosk or BluSmart app. Or use the one generated during the ride scheduled.
3. Get into the first available cab and share the PIN with the driver.
4. Enjoy your ride and get down at the destination. Pay through cash/wallet after completing your ride.
5. For pickups from the Bengaluru Airport, schedule your cab, enter your destination & voila!

Episode 9.4.8 : The One With Premium Airport Rides

descriptionHtml:
BluSmart is India’s first all-electric cab service. BluSmart cabs are revolutionizing the way people travel in cabs in urban India. If you are looking for a safe, reliable, and sustainable taxi service in Delhi NCR or Bengaluru, look no further. Our noiseless, eco-friendly cabs are also available for airport transfers to & from the IGI Airport, Delhi & Kempegowda International Airport Bengaluru.

BluSmart’s highest-rated cab booking app allows you to schedule your cab up to 48 hours in advance, anytime you want. Moreover, BluSmart guarantees zero driver cancellations and zero surge prices, all the time.

We are serviceable in Gurgaon, and areas of Delhi (South Delhi, Dwarka, Vikaspuri, Janakpuri, NDLS, North Delhi up to Connaught Place, Chandni Chowk, etc.)
In Bengaluru, pickups & drops are available at the Bengaluru airport, HSR Layout, Koramangala, Indiranagar, Domlur, Lakkasandra, Kudlu, Tilak Nagar & Kodihalli.

Why choose BluSmart?

• Flat fares: No matter what time of the day or night, you will only be charged flat, km-based fares, with no unexpected surge prices.

• No cancellations: Travel with utmost peace of mind 24X7 because our driver-partners will never cancel your ride.

• Professional driver-partners: Our responsible cab drivers are police verified & engaged with us full-time. They also open the cab door for the riders to minimize surface contact.

• Safe & sanitised cabs: With top-of-the-line safety & hygiene protocols in place, we ensure that our vehicles are spick & span for each ride.

• Scheduled cabs: Travelling to the office every day? Schedule your BluSmart in advance & enjoy a seamless experience.

• Rides & Hourly Rentals: Whether you need a ride to work, or have to get groceries & run a few errands without having to switch between multiple cabs for the sake of hygiene and safety, we've got a BluSmart for every use!

• Convenient airport taxi services: Need an airport taxi in Gurgaon, Delhi NCR or Bengaluru? BluSmart’s airport taxi services are hassle-free because there are no last-minute cancellations & you can schedule them up to 30 days in advance. Our electric cabs also have a jumbo boot space for all your luggage.

• Multiple payment options: With over 10 ways to pay, including credit and debit cards, UPI, Net banking, Paytm, MobiKwik, PayZapp, and Freecharge you can make cashless payments through our BluSmart cab booking app. You can also add money to your BLU WALLET to pay for the cab ride.

Steps for hourly rental taxi booking or cab ride :
1. Select your pickup and drop location respectively.
2. Select your pickup time and package (in case of hourly rentals). You can book 45 minutes to 48 hours in advance.
3. Select your payment method.
4. Confirm your ride. No need to worry about driver cancellation. 
5. Enjoy your ride and get down at the destination, refreshed. Pay through cash/wallet after completing your ride.

Steps to book airport taxi services:
1. At the IGI Airport, head to BluSmart Pickup Zone at Level 2, Multi-Level Car Parking (above Uber and Ola Pickup zones) at T3 or walk over to the BluSmart kiosk at T1 & T2.
2. Generate a PIN instantly from the kiosk or BluSmart app. Or use the one generated during the ride scheduled.
3. Get into the first available cab and share the PIN with the driver.
4. Enjoy your ride and get down at the destination. Pay through cash/wallet after completing your ride.
5. For pickups from the Bengaluru Airport, schedule your cab, enter your destination & voila!

• No cancellations: Travel with utmost peace of mind 24X7 because our driver-partners will never cancel your ride.

• Professional driver-partners: Our responsible cab drivers are police verified & engaged with us full-time. They also open the cab door for the riders to minimize surface contact.

• Safe & sanitised cabs: With top-of-the-line safety & hygiene protocols in place, we ensure that our vehicles are spick & span for each ride.

• Scheduled cabs: Travelling to the office every day? Schedule your BluSmart in advance & enjoy a seamless experience.

• Rides & Hourly Rentals: Whether you need a ride to work, or have to get groceries & run a few errands without having to switch between multiple cabs for the sake of hygiene and safety, we've got a BluSmart for every use!

• Convenient airport taxi services: Need an airport taxi in Gurgaon, Delhi NCR or Bengaluru? BluSmart’s airport taxi services are hassle-free because there are no last-minute cancellations & you can schedule them up to 30 days in advance. Our electric cabs also have a jumbo boot space for all your luggage.

• Multiple payment options: With over 10 ways to pay, including credit and debit cards, UPI, Net banking, Paytm, MobiKwik, PayZapp, and Freecharge you can make cashless payments through our BluSmart cab booking app. You can also add money to your BLU WALLET to pay for the cab ride.

Steps for hourly rental taxi booking or cab ride :
1. Select your pickup and drop location respectively.
2. Select your pickup time and package (in case of hourly rentals). You can book 45 minutes to 48 hours in advance.
3. Select your payment method.
4. Confirm your ride. No need to worry about driver cancellation. 
5. Enjoy your ride and get down at the destination, refreshed. Pay through cash/wallet after completing your ride.

Steps to book airport taxi services:
1. At the IGI Airport, head to BluSmart Pickup Zone at Level 2, Multi-Level Car Parking (above Uber and Ola Pickup zones) at T3 or walk over to the BluSmart kiosk at T1 & T2.
2. Generate a PIN instantly from the kiosk or BluSmart app. Or use the one generated during the ride scheduled.
3. Get into the first available cab and share the PIN with the driver.
4. Enjoy your ride and get down at the destination. Pay through cash/wallet after completing your ride.
5. For pickups from the Bengaluru Airport, schedule your cab, enter your destination & voila!

creator: BluSmart Mobility Tech Private Ltd.
descriptionHtml:
BluSmart is India’s first all-electric cab service. BluSmart cabs are revolutionizing the way people travel in cabs in urban India. If you are looking for a safe, reliable, and sustainable taxi service in Delhi NCR or Bengaluru, look no further. Our noiseless, eco-friendly cabs are also available for airport transfers to & from the IGI Airport, Delhi & Kempegowda International Airport Bengaluru.

BluSmart’s highest-rated cab booking app allows you to schedule your cab up to 48 hours in advance, anytime you want. Moreover, BluSmart guarantees zero driver cancellations and zero surge prices, all the time.

We are serviceable in Gurgaon, and areas of Delhi (South Delhi, Dwarka, Vikaspuri, Janakpuri, NDLS, North Delhi up to Connaught Place, Chandni Chowk, etc.)
In Bengaluru, pickups & drops are available at the Bengaluru airport, HSR Layout, Koramangala, Indiranagar, Domlur, Lakkasandra, Kudlu, Tilak Nagar & Kodihalli.

Why choose BluSmart?

• Flat fares: No matter what time of the day or night, you will only be charged flat, km-based fares, with no unexpected surge prices.

• No cancellations: Travel with utmost peace of mind 24X7 because our driver-partners will never cancel your ride.

• Professional driver-partners: Our responsible cab drivers are police verified & engaged with us full-time. They also open the cab door for the riders to minimize surface contact.

• Safe & sanitised cabs: With top-of-the-line safety & hygiene protocols in place, we ensure that our vehicles are spick & span for each ride.

• Scheduled cabs: Travelling to the office every day? Schedule your BluSmart in advance & enjoy a seamless experience.

• Rides & Hourly Rentals: Whether you need a ride to work, or have to get groceries & run a few errands without having to switch between multiple cabs for the sake of hygiene and safety, we've got a BluSmart for every use!

• Convenient airport taxi services: Need an airport taxi in Gurgaon, Delhi NCR or Bengaluru? BluSmart’s airport taxi services are hassle-free because there are no last-minute cancellations & you can schedule them up to 30 days in advance. Our electric cabs also have a jumbo boot space for all your luggage.

• Multiple payment options: With over 10 ways to pay, including credit and debit cards, UPI, Net banking, Paytm, MobiKwik, PayZapp, and Freecharge you can make cashless payments through our BluSmart cab booking app. You can also add money to your BLU WALLET to pay for the cab ride.

Steps for hourly rental taxi booking or cab ride :
1. Select your pickup and drop location respectively.
2. Select your pickup time and package (in case of hourly rentals). You can book 45 minutes to 48 hours in advance.
3. Select your payment method.
4. Confirm your ride. No need to worry about driver cancellation. 
5. Enjoy your ride and get down at the destination, refreshed. Pay through cash/wallet after completing your ride.

Steps to book airport taxi services:
1. At the IGI Airport, head to BluSmart Pickup Zone at Level 2, Multi-Level Car Parking (above Uber and Ola Pickup zones) at T3 or walk over to the BluSmart kiosk at T1 & T2.
2. Generate a PIN instantly from the kiosk or BluSmart app. Or use the one generated during the ride scheduled.
3. Get into the first available cab and share the PIN with the driver.
4. Enjoy your ride and get down at the destination. Pay through cash/wallet after completing your ride.
5. For pickups from the Bengaluru Airport, schedule your cab, enter your destination & voila!


Follow us on Instagram: https://instagram.com/blusmartindia
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/BluSmartIndia
Have questions? Please write to us on support@blu-smart.com
descriptionShort: Reliable and Environment Friendly Taxis On-Demand. No Surge-Pricing.

• No cancellations: Travel with utmost peace of mind 24X7 because our driver-partners will never cancel your ride.

• Professional driver-partners: Our responsible cab drivers are police verified & engaged with us full-time. They also open the cab door for the riders to minimize surface contact.

• Safe & sanitised cabs: With top-of-the-line safety & hygiene protocols in place, we ensure that our vehicles are spick & span for each ride.

• Scheduled cabs: Travelling to the office every day? Schedule your BluSmart in advance & enjoy a seamless experience.

• Rides & Hourly Rentals: Whether you need a ride to work, or have to get groceries & run a few errands without having to switch between multiple cabs for the sake of hygiene and safety, we've got a BluSmart for every use!

• Convenient airport taxi services: Need an airport taxi in Gurgaon, Delhi NCR or Bengaluru? BluSmart’s airport taxi services are hassle-free because there are no last-minute cancellations & you can schedule them up to 30 days in advance. Our electric cabs also have a jumbo boot space for all your luggage.

• Multiple payment options: With over 10 ways to pay, including credit and debit cards, UPI, Net banking, Paytm, MobiKwik, PayZapp, and Freecharge you can make cashless payments through our BluSmart cab booking app. You can also add money to your BLU WALLET to pay for the cab ride.

Steps for hourly rental taxi booking or cab ride :
1. Select your pickup and drop location respectively.
2. Select your pickup time and package (in case of hourly rentals). You can book 45 minutes to 48 hours in advance.

5. Enjoy your ride and get down at the destination, refreshed. Pay through cash/wallet after completing your ride.

Steps to book airport taxi services:
1. At the IGI Airport, head to BluSmart Pickup Zone at Level 2, Multi-Level Car Parking (above Uber and Ola Pickup zones) at T3 or walk over to the BluSmart kiosk at T1 & T2.
2. Generate a PIN instantly from the kiosk or BluSmart app. Or use the one generated during the ride scheduled.
3. Get into the first available cab and share the PIN with the driver.
4. Enjoy your ride and get down at the destination. Pay through cash/wallet after completing your ride.
